dialogue.content: I'm finding it hard to read the labels on my spice jars in the kitchen.
Small text can be a real pain. Have you tried using a magnifying glass?
I have one, but I'm always misplacing it when I'm cooking.
What about using the 'Magnifier' app that's built into your iPhone?
Oh, I'm very comfortable with my iPhone! I didn't know it could do that.
It's great; it even has a flashlight to help you see in the cupboards.
That is incredibly handy! I'm going to set up that Magnifier shortcut right now.
